original: 江夏郡竟陵縣人，劉璋之子。劉備攻益州時，劉璋派劉循守衛雒城，劉循和劉璝堅守一年才被攻陷，之後劉循歸降劉備。
text: A native of Jingling County, Jiangxia County, son of Liu Zhang. When Liu Bei attacked Yizhou, Liu Zhang sent Liu Xun to guard Luocheng. Liu Xun and Liu Huang stood firm for a year before being captured. Later, Liu Xun returned to Liu Bei.
